how.title: My involvement
how.content: I helped the Gold Challenge team to design and deliver many different page and email templates, using HTML and CSS. I also built many different brand pages that were in partnership with the Gold Challenge.
how.thoughts:
I was very proud to be part of the team and deliver these templates that would be seen by many people, leading up to the 2012 Olympics.
